name: Inside the Void VR
description:
Alien structures have been sighted on a remote planet. Several spacecraft have been sent to investigate the structures, but all communication with the crew has been lost.

Your mission is to investigate the planet and search for the lost crew.

Navigate a remote alien planet in virtual reality. Explore seven alien structures in an effort to unravel the disappearance of the lost crew members. Each structure is a gateway to an endless void. You will encounter log entries that offer a glimpse into the fate of the lost crew members.

Features:
• Stylized 3D low poly environments
• Explore an alien planet and seven unique environments
• Unravel the story of the lost crew members
• Immersive ambient soundtrack
• Open world exploration

Designed for Google Cardboard (Google VR) virtual reality headset.
